soar.robot.pioneer¶

class soar.robot.pioneer.PioneerRobot¶

Bases: soar.robot.base.BaseRobot

An abstract, universal Pioneer 3 robot–that is, instances of this class can be fully simulated or used to connect with an actual Pioneer 3 robot.

FV_CAP¶

float – The maximum translational velocity at which the robot can move, in meters/second.

RV_CAP¶

float – The maximum rotational velocity at which the robot can move, in radians/second.

SONAR_MAX¶

float – The maximum distance that the sonars can sense, in meters.

get_sonars()¶

Returns the latest sonar distances as an array.

Returns:A list containing The latest distance sensed by each sonar, in order from the robot’s left clockwise to its right, in meters, accurate to the millimeter. If no distance was sensed by a sonar, its value will be 5.0.
set_forward_velocity(fv)¶

Sets the robot’s forward velocity subject to FV_CAP.

Parameters:fv (float) – The new forward velocity, in meters/second. Positive values move forwards and negative values move backwards.
set_rotational_velocity(rv)¶

Sets the robot’s rotational velocity subject to RV_CAP.

Parameters:rv (float) – The new rotational velocity, in radians/second. Positive values move counterclockwise and negative ones move clockwise.
